string-array.name: mili_help_tips
string-array.item: "Make sure the band is charged and hasn't run out of power."
Turn off Bluetooth first, then pair with current device.
"If the band is charged, but the phone can't see it, try restarting phone's Bluetooth."
Bluetoothを再起動しても問題が解決しない場合は、携帯を再起動してみてください。

string-array.name: mili_help_title
string-array.item: Is this band paired with another device?
Bluetoothを再起動してみてください
お使いの携帯を再起動してみてください

string-array.name: normandy_help_tips
string-array.item: "Huami sensor battery life is 6 months. If you've been using it for a longer period, maybe there's no power left."
Turn off Bluetooth on the other device first, then pair with your phone.
Try rebooting your phone, and then pair the band.
Bluetoothを再起動しても問題が解決しない場合は、携帯を再起動してみてください。
Every time you open Mi Fit, it will try to sync data automatically.

string-array.name: normandy_help_title
string-array.item: Is this Huami sensor paired with another device?
Bluetoothを再起動してみてください
お使いの携帯を再起動してみてください
How do I sync data with the sensor?

string-array.name: shoes_help_tips
string-array.item: "If you don't use Huami sensor for a long time, it goes to sleep. Try to shake it"
"Huami sensor battery life is 1 year. If you've been using it for a longer period, maybe there's no power left."
Turn off Bluetooth device first, then pair with current device.
Try rebooting your phone, and then pair the band.
Bluetoothを再起動しても問題が解決しない場合は、携帯を再起動してみてください。
Every time you open Mi Fit it will try to sync data automatically.

string-array.name: shoes_help_title
string-array.item: Is this Huami sensor paired with another device?
Bluetoothを再起動してみてください
お使いの携帯を再起動してみてください

string-array.name: weight_help_tips
string-array.item: You can step on the scale to check if it shows your weight. If it displays a battery icon, replace the batteries.
"If there's no response when you step on the scale, check if the batteries are installed properly."
"If the band is charged, but the phone can't see it, try restarting phone's Bluetooth."
Bluetoothを再起動しても問題が解決しない場合は、携帯を再起動してみてください。
Every time you open Mi Fit it will try to sync data automatically.

string-array.item: バッテリー残量は充分ありますか？
